headline: WATCH: Rep. Madison Cawthorn Rips Biden As ‘Inept, Geriatric Despot’ On The House Floor
author: Becky Noble
sentences: And the westerly routes to the Pacific would also give the UK direct sea-level routes to friendly nations arrayed against communist China, North Korea and Russia, like Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, the Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Myanmar, Thailand, Sri Lanka and India.

Through the American Canal CANZUK's United Kingdom would have direct sea-level seaway routes to the Pacific ports of its other constituent parts, Canada, Australia and New Zealand, westerly as well as the current more convoluted and vulnerable routes easterly through Suez.

It can be entered by going to San Diego or Brownsville or from the Port of Quebec City through the Saint Lawrence Seaway, the Welland Canal and the Great Lakes and through major rivers and inland canals to the Port of New Orleans, thence to Brownsville.

The American Canal, many times the size of Panama's, would eliminate such restrictions and allow, for example, carriers, battleships, tankers and floating residences of hundreds of thousands of tons displacement, perhaps with multiple hulls.

The American Canal, hard by the GREATEST OIL STRIKE IN HISTORY, on federal lands in the Permian Basin of Texas, will vastly improve global trade routes between Asia and Oceania on the one hand and Europe and Africa on the other.
Large ocean-going commercial vessels and warships will also be able to go up the Missouri/Mississippi, the world's third-longest river, through America's heartland to the Dakotas.
These water routes between Quebec City and the Dakotas and New Orleans should in due course be enlarged to accommodate much larger vessels, both commercial and military.
A significant part of this improvement will be a reduction in traffic through the South China Sea and the Persian Gulf, Strait of Hormuz, Gulf of Oman and the Red Sea.
THE AMERICAN CANAL WILL COMPOUND THE UTILITY OF AMERICAN AND ALLIED MILITARY ASSETS BY GREATLY FACILITATING THEIR DEPLOYMENT AND REDEPLOYMENT WORLD-WIDE.
American Border Defense Forces must retake control for a supplemental link between the Atlantic and Pacific, and to prevent its use by the enemy.
Panama’s canal has been key to the American world order for a century, but it’s now under the control of communist China.
It will also greatly expedite sea travel between the UK and Pacific ports of the Americas, Australia, and New Zealand.
Its economic importance and strategic significance are so immense that it's hard to see why it's not being done.
American Border Defense Forces should dig the American Canal between Brownsville and San Diego.
The American Canal will be a sea-level seaway like the Suez Canal, with no need for locks.
In the first place, it's far better than a wall in blocking land invasion from the south.
It should be done in the interests of global civilization and America, its last bulwark.
For a century the design of large ships has been limited by the size of Panama's canal.
Ships could also come from the Dakotas down the Missouri/Mississippi to New Orleans.
The Freedom Ship currently under development would displace 2.7 million tons.
Transit will be much faster than through Panama's canal with its 12 locks.
Fuel can be taken on at Brownsville, San Diego, and other nearby points.
Their strategic significance will be correspondingly reduced.
Allowance should be made for future expansion of the Canal.
The American Canal would enhance its utility.
Submarines can transit submerged.
